review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: Did you give yourself the opportunity to shift perspective on a situation in your
            life? That puts you on The Path.
quote: "In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love." Mother Teresa

step_of_the_day.title: Inject love into your actions today and see how this helps you (Pillars #1 & 6)
step_of_the_day.content:
It’s easy to get caught up in the stresses of your daily life, and to experience them as a struggle. It can
            be a struggle to survive, a struggle to deal with conflict, or a struggle to address a personal issue or
            short-coming. The struggle can leave you feeling frustrated, sad, or simply drained. I have found one
            variable that can positively modify these experiences: love. Even when it doesn’t seem to fit the
            conversation, love can make a difference.

action_step:
Today and tomorrow (since it’s already late in the day), make an effort to bring love to your experiences.
            This can mean as Mother Teresa suggests, do what you are doing with great love. It can also mean be loving
            toward yourself and be loving toward others. Notice if this focus, this preoccupation with a loving approach
            to life, leaves less space for struggle.
journal_entry: Write about your relationship with love and how it fits into your life.
